title: Military Radio Chatter SFX Bundle
description: Various Military Radio Chatter sound effects including warnings, callouts, affirmations, permissions sounds and more.Brand new sounds for all your war and sci-fi games and film projects.
longDescription: This is Coyote, standby, the target's on the move. Do you copy? Military Radio Chatter SFX bundle calls out to you from the depths of war! This bundle contains male radio communication sounds that is suitable for military settings in your projects. To make the most organic texture possible, we present you sounds that were recorded in 24bit/96KHz with a real walkie talkie . The texture of the sounds are realistic and flexible for customization. Military Radio Chatter Sound Effects Bundle was recorded and designed delicately for all your military radio announcement needs. This bundle covers all sound effects needs for any war or sci-fi game projects and films that you are working on.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 120

Number of Audio Cues: 120

Sample rate / bit rate: 24-bit / 96 kHz

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 7 min 1 sec

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
